trans-unit.source: Categories for the Calendar Base extension.
trans-unit.target: Categories for the Calendar Base extension.

trans-unit.source: Categories that events can be assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Categories that events can be assigned to.

trans-unit.source: Disables the category so that it is not visible in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Disables the category so that it is not visible in the frontend.

trans-unit.source: Sets a date at which the category will be visible in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Sets a date at which the category will be visible in the frontend.

trans-unit.source: Sets a date at which the category will no longer be visible in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Sets a date at which the category will no longer be visible in the frontend.

trans-unit.source: CSS class used to format all event headers in this category.
trans-unit.target: CSS class used to format all event headers in this category.

trans-unit.source:
You can assign each category a different colored bullet that precedes the events in the Month View and the Header colors in the Day and Week views. To use the out-of-the-box bullet colors, simply enter the corresponding style in the Header Style field:
Blue Bullets: default_catheader Green Bullets: green_catheader Grey Bullets: grey_catheader Orange Bullets: orange_catheader Pink Bullets: pink_catheader Red Bullets: red_catheader Yellow Bullets: yellow_catheader
Note: If you would like to expand or change the color choices, you can do so by modifying the default style sheet.
trans-unit.target:
You can assign each category a different colored bullet that precedes the events in the Month View and the Header colors in the Day and Week views. To use the out-of-the-box bullet colors, simply enter the corresponding style in the Header Style field:
Blue Bullets: default_catheader Green Bullets: green_catheader Grey Bullets: grey_catheader Orange Bullets: orange_catheader Pink Bullets: pink_catheader Red Bullets: red_catheader Yellow Bullets: yellow_catheader
Note: If you would like to expand or change the color choices, you can do so by modifying the default style sheet.

trans-unit.source: CSS class used to format all event bodies in this category.
trans-unit.target: CSS class used to format all event bodies in this category.

trans-unit.source:
You can assign each category a different colored “Busy Time” in the Day and Week views. To use the out-of-the-box colors, simply enter the corresponding style in the Body Style field:
Blue: default_catbody Green: green_catbody Grey: grey_catbody Orange: orange_catbody Pink: pink_catbody Red: red_catbody Yellow: yellow_catbody
Note: If you would like to expand or change the color choices, you can do so by modifying the default style sheet.
trans-unit.target:
You can assign each category a different colored “Busy Time” in the Day and Week views. To use the out-of-the-box colors, simply enter the corresponding style in the Body Style field:
Blue: default_catbody Green: green_catbody Grey: grey_catbody Orange: orange_catbody Pink: pink_catbody Red: red_catbody Yellow: yellow_catbody
Note: If you would like to expand or change the color choices, you can do so by modifying the default style sheet.

trans-unit.source: Calendar that this category appears on.
trans-unit.target: Calendar that this category appears on.

trans-unit.source: By limiting the category to a specific calendar, you can limit users or usergroups who can view the category's events
trans-unit.target: By limiting the category to a specific calendar, you can limit users or usergroups who can view the category's events

trans-unit.source: Sets the current category as a sub-category.
trans-unit.target: Sets the current category as a sub-category.

trans-unit.source: Allows the category to be shared with anyone who has shared event priviliges already.
trans-unit.target: Allows the category to be shared with anyone who has shared event priviliges already.

trans-unit.source: Page where individual events from this category will be shown.
trans-unit.target: Page where individual events from this category will be shown.
